name: The Factory (on team-and-click.com)
description:
Your team event was supposed to be an educational factory tour. But then: Cyber attack, power outage, get out of here! Can you put the old steam engine in the factory museum back to work to generate enough emergency power? Will you find evidence that points to those behind the attack? And then there is the 'special present' which the saboteurs sent to the factory... This is the free 60min escape room of TEAM&click. 

You can play it for free in multiplayer mode in a group of up to five friends. Just send the Magic Link on our homepage to your friends and immediately start the first ever online multiplayer point and click adventure!
